title: Stability & Hardening
description: Deep audit of daemon, proxy, and plugin found 23 bugs, memory leaks, and resource management issues. This epic tracks fixes grouped by component and relatedness across 8 tasks.
architectureNotes: Components affected: moe-daemon (ActivityLog, StateManager, FileWatcher, McpAdapter, wait-for-task, shutdown), moe-proxy (stdin handling, reconnection), moe-jetbrains plugin (WebSocket lifecycle, scheduler, dispose). Priority order: CRITICAL items first (activity log OOM, proxy listener accumulation), then HIGH, then MEDIUM.
epicRails: All fixes must include regression tests or test updates
No breaking changes to MCP tool API contracts
Fixes must be backward-compatible with existing .moe/ state files
